summary: Fort Dawnguard Improvements is mod which make from the fort perfect place for living!
descriptionHtml:
[size=5][b]Important:
Subscripe this mod after completing Dawnguard story line!
It does conflict with the UNOFFICIAL DAWNGUARD PATCH! [/b][/size]
...you need of course DLC Dawnguard.
___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________


[size=3][b]Improvements [/b][/size]
*/ Added the pullbar for doors in main hall 
*/ Removed cobwebs 
*/ Safe storing items 
*/ Completely changed rooms 
*/ Added many things in the main hall 
*/ Improved lighting 
*/ Removed some mess (fallen items etc.) 
*/ And much much more 


[size=3][b]Progress [/b][/size]
*/ Current version: [b]1.21[/b]
*/ Inn completed - working now on a Innkeeper (I have some trouble with it)
*/ 1. floor - 100% 
*/ 2. floor - 100% 
*/ Exterior - Maybe (for now 5%) 


[size=3][b]Troubles [/b][/size]
*/ Can be somewhere lighting bugs 
*/ Can be somewhere fallen items; floating items - solution: 
- 1. Go out from the fort - save your game, quit game. 
- 2. Delete mod. 
- 3. Start game and go in the fort, go out and save it agin. 
- 4. Download mod, go in the fort. Should be ok now. 
- I think it happens when interior try respawn already removed items, don\'t know how fix it other way 
*/ Incompatible with other mods which edit Fort Dawnguard 


[size=3][b]Other [/b][/size]
*/ Autor: Groon 
*/ If you like it - don\'t forget rate this mod! :-)


___________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

author: Groon
